summary: A goofy student is taught a lost martial art style by five ghosts.
cast: Jackie Chan|Chih-Ping Chiang|Hsiu-yi Fang|Hong Hsu|Yuan Hsu|Ching Fu Li|Hai Lung Li|Tung-Chun Li|Wen-Tai Li|Szu-Cheng Mu|Kang Peng|Kap-Sung Ra|Li Rung Chuen|Dean Shek|James Tien|Li-Peng Wan|Kuang Yu Wang|Yao Wang|Ching Wong|Te-Shan Wu|Wen-Hsiu Wu|Biao Yuen
title: Quan jing
